titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President, with the advice and consent of the Senate, should posthumously advance rear Admiral Husband E. Kimmell to the grade of admiral on the retired list.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from Navy.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, should posthumously advance Rear Admiral Husband E. Kimmel, U.S. Navy, to the grade of admiral on the retired list.
